name: Dorian therapeutics
headline: New therapeutics to rejuvenate tissue and treat age-related diseases

SCIENCE
Dorian Therapeutics is the leading company working on senoblockers, a new class of therapeutics that can rejuvenate cells and tissues. Based on a patented technology developed at Stanford University, Dorian’s team is bringing to the clinic an innovative solution for age-associated diseases.
![Screen Shot 2020-08-13 at 1.40.26 PM.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/cfabdd_cd28e9776c0842b9af0001286098ecb9~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_61,y_0,w_815,h_868/fill/w_461,h_479,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Screen%20Shot%202020-08-13%20at%201_40_26%20PM.png)
## The Problem: Aging
There is one common risk factor for the majority of diseases in the developed world: aging.
At Dorian, we are rethinking how to address these unmet medical needs and we have found our answer in the biology of aging.
![joel-filipe-GVV669GVYjo-unsplash-min.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5f8233_8fae90fc396b48938be1dcbe1ef0413d~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_1080,h_1008,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/5f8233_8fae90fc396b48938be1dcbe1ef0413d~mv2.jpg)
# DORIAN THERAPEUTICS
Younger, for longer.
![LongBump_FINAL.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5f8233_9534dfa270224ae7b5c8a62678256326~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_680,h_83,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/LongBump_FINAL.png)
![LongBump_FINAL.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5f8233_9534dfa270224ae7b5c8a62678256326~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_60,h_7,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/LongBump_FINAL.png)
## The Solution:
##  Senoblockers
During aging, there is a decrease in the activity of stem cells, and therefore a reduced regenerative capacity. Additionally, senescent cells accumulate in the body and poison entire tissues.
​
Dorian's Senoblockers act on epigenetic regulators to reverse both processes, reactivating programs of youthfulness and regeneration.
![Asset 1@4x.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5f8233_7f28af9133c94d1bb93a350841121507~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_58,h_36,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Asset%201%404x.png)

generated_description:
Dorian Therapeutics is an innovative biotech company nestled in San Carlos, California, which is on a mission to tackle aging and age-related diseases. Founded in 2018 and a proud member of Y Combinator’s Summer 2018 batch, they’re a small but ambitious team of eight.

So what’s their big idea? They’re pioneering a new class of therapeutics known as **senoblockers**. This cutting-edge technology aims to rejuvenate tissues by addressing one fundamental issue that underlies many diseases: aging. With roots in patented research from Stanford University, Dorian is working on a solution that has the potential to reverse the harmful effects of aging at the cellular level.

The science speaks to a pressing issue—aging leads to decreased stem cell activity and an accumulation of senescent cells, which can wreak havoc on our bodies. Dorian's senoblockers target these processes, aiming to rejuvenate our biological systems by restoring cellular function and enhancing regeneration.

Their approach is direct: by understanding and manipulating the biology of aging, they believe they can not only extend lifespan but also improve the quality of life as we age. This is summed up nicely in their motto—"Younger, for longer."

In summary, Dorian Therapeutics is not just about slowing down the clock; they’re about finding tangible treatments for age-related decline. With an ambitious vision and an impressive scientific backing, they’re carving a distinctive niche in the biotech landscape. If you're curious about their journey or want to learn more, you can visit their website at [Dorian Therapeutics](http://www.doriantherapeutics.com).
